name: Potatoes for the dead
description:
Potatoes for the dead

Your clan has disowned you, and rightly so, as you ate ALL their precious potatoes. Now, a pariah, you must regain the trust of the community by scavenging the graveyard for the starchiest of orbs; the potato!

The game was made in a week using Godot for the VimJam 2020. This is my first game.

Everyting is made by me, except the lightning sound effect made by Grant Evans.
